pr_title: Skip upload of unchanged application content

timeline.bodyText: This call is already made on line 156. Could we reuse the CloudApplication?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText:
Better naming of the variable.
Also, could you extract StepsUtil.getUploadToken(execution.getContext()) into separate variable?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: Done. I've renamed it and inverted it so it is easier to understand.
replies.author: VaskoBozhurski

timeline.bodyText: Is this necessarry to be info message?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: I think it is much more easier to understand what is happening with your deployment when this message exists as otherwise you only see the message saying "Uploading Application X", while there is no actual deployment happening.
replies.author: VaskoBozhurski
